RUSSIA.Reference ray E.L.S.. 1526 and 3.L.S. 1539..From General Niessel January 2nd: General Tabouis has asked that the Czech troops in the Ukraine may he kept there.. General Niessel entirely agrees with General Tabouis on this point, and adds that the influence of the Czechs in the Ukraine is extremely valuable, both from a political point of view, and in view of the fact that they are the only troops whose morale is perfectly sound.
